description:
Background video recorder, screen recorder and remote camera control.

FadCam is a privacy-focused, open-source multimedia recorder designed for continuous and crash-safe reliable recording use cases.

Key Features: Background video recording with screen off • Dashcam-style recording for driving/riding • Android screen recording with annotation tools • Live streaming over local network • Remote camera control through web UI • Fragmented MP4 format (zero corruption risk) • Custom watermark text overlays

Perfect for: CCTV camera at home - monitor and control via FadCam Remote web UI • Dashcam while driving or riding • Feature-rich screen recorder for Android (no watermarks) • Security monitoring and content creation

All features work without ads or trackers.

FadCam Pro is also available for lifetime access purchase - check my Patreon link inside the app for details.
